review.title: “Very Dissatisfying with no competent leadership and no room for advancement.”
review.pros: Pros – It is a Long Island Company and travel to NYC is not required every day.
review.cons: Cons – Partners have complete lack of trust and no consideration for their key employees. There is no chance for advancement and the company leaders are incompetent. Communication is crritical yet the partners choose not to do so even with the senior staff. This used to be a good strong company however the new partners are driving the company into the ground.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Senior staff is the backbone of the company and they need to be accomodated both financially and treated like the professionals they are
